document.docAuthor: Akhtar, Mir Samim, Dey, Debjani & Usmani, Mohd. Kamil
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of aphid parasitoids (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Aphidiinae) from India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of aphid parasitoids (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Aphidiinae) from India

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Aphidius arundinis Haliday var. obscuriformi Quilis, 1931: 50-51
.

subSubSection.paragraph:

on

;

solanella (Stary and Ghosh 1983);
